item.title: Zimbabwe shuts down amid calls for protests
item.description: Many streets across Zimbabwe remained deserted and empty on the day of a planned protest.

item.title: Bodies of three missing US soldiers found in Lithuania
item.description: The search for a fourth soldier is ongoing in a swampy bog near PabradÄ—, where they were taking part in military drills.

item.title: Shock Le Pen verdict rocks French far right
item.description: The far-right figurehead has been barred from running for public office for five years, throwing her plans into disarray.

item.title: Global shares slide as Trump tariffs loom
item.description: The US president suggests the new import taxes he is set to announce this week will hit all countries.

item.title: Red Cross outraged over killing of medics by Israeli forces in Gaza
item.description: Six Civil Defence first responders and a UN employee were also killed in the incident in Rafah on 23 March.
